job_tasks.phrase: draagt bij aan de strategische doelstellingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a responsibility to align technical work with the overall business strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: hebben een directe impact op de data-gedreven besluitvorming binnen de organisatie
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the role's influence on business decisions through data.

job_tasks.phrase: richt zich op geavanceerde analytics, inclusief Data Science, Deep Learning en Generative AI
job_tasks.justification: This phrase broadly covers the domain of AI and ML modeling.
This directly refers to the creation and development of Generative AI applications, a core modeling task.
This involves the practical implementation and integration of AI functionalities into applications.
This indicates setting up and configuring cloud infrastructure to support applications.

job_tasks.phrase: werken aan zowel de backend als de frontend
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions full-stack development responsibilities, a key aspect of software development.
This implies working within a DevOps framework, which is related to MLOps practices for managing AI systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt samen met een team van professionals
verantwoordelijk bent voor het opleiden en coachen van teamleden
werk je in een dynamisch team

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development of 'Generative AI-toepassingen' and mentions working with 'Deep Learning and Generative AI.' While it mentions full-stack development, the core focus is on building applications powered by generative AI, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile's core responsibilities.
